Introduction
This topic contains information on developing claims based on exposure to contaminants in the water supply at Camp Lejeune, including
actions taken by centralized processing RO on Camp Lejeune claims
determining the need forÂ medical opinions

inextricably intertwined non-Camp Lejeune legacy appeals

title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section A - Developing Claims Based on Exposure to Contaminants in the Water Supply at Camp Lejeune
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 8, Section A
